Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) self:hidden(1) self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.5) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) self:basezoomx(SCREEN_WIDTH/640) self:basezoomy(SCREEN_HEIGHT/480) self:diffusealpha(0) vtd_bgd = self; end
%function(self) self:hidden(1) self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.5) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) self:basezoomx(SCREEN_WIDTH/640) self:basezoomy(SCREEN_HEIGHT/480) self:diffusealpha(0) vtd_bgch = self; end
%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.5) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) self:basezoomx(SCREEN_WIDTH/640) self:basezoomy(SCREEN_HEIGHT/480) self:diffuse(.5,.5,.5,1) vtd_bg0 = self; end

Layer.ShowSelfCommand: %function(self) fuckOITGtable = {vtd_bgbar,vtd_bgbarc, vtd_topbar,vtd_botbar,vtd_avydia,vtd_tag,vtd_kyi,vtd_wordbartop,vtd_wordbarbot} for i,v in pairs(fuckOITGtable) do if v then v:queuecommand('ShowSelf') end end end

Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) self:hidden(0) self:zoomtowidth(SCREEN_WIDTH) self:zoomy(0) self:customtexturerect(0,0,2,1) self:texcoordvelocity(.1,0) self:cropbottom(.2) self:y(0) self:blend('add') self:diffusealpha(.3) vtd_wordbartop = self end

%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:zoomtowidth(SCREEN_WIDTH) self:zoomy(0) self:customtexturerect(0,0,2,1) self:texcoordvelocity(-.1,0) self:y(0) self:cropbottom(.2) self:diffusealpha(.3) self:blend('add') vtd_wordbarbot = self end
%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:zoomtowidth(SCREEN_WIDTH) self:zoomy(0) vtd_bgbar = self end
%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:zoomtowidth(SCREEN_WIDTH) self:zoomy(1) self:diffusealpha(0) self:blend('add') vtd_bgbarc = self end
%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:zoomtowidth(SCREEN_WIDTH) self:zoomy(0) self:blend('add') vtd_botbar = self end
%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:zoomtowidth(SCREEN_WIDTH) self:zoomy(0) self:blend('add') vtd_topbar = self end

%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:zoom(0) self:rotationz(90) self:rotationy(-90) self:diffuseshift() self:effectclock('bgm') self:effectperiod(2) self:effectcolor1(.9,.9,.9,.4) self:effectcolor2(1,1,1,.4) self:effectoffset(1) self:blend('add') vtd_avydia = self end
%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:diffusealpha(0) self:zoom(.25) self:y(-10) vtd_kyi = self end
%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:diffusealpha(0) self:zoom(.25) self:y(-10) self:setstate(0) self:pause() vtd_tkyi = self end

%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:rotationy(180) self:diffusealpha(0) self:diffuseramp() self:effectclock('bgm') self:effectperiod(2) self:effectcolor1(.9,.9,.9,.65) self:effectcolor2(1,1,1,.75) self:effectoffset(1) vtd_tag = self end
%function(self) self:hidden(1) self:zoomtowidth(SCREEN_WIDTH) self:zoomtoheight(SCREEN_HEIGHT) self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) self:diffuse(.5,.5,.5,1) vtd_quad = self end
%function(self) self:hidden(1) vtd_group5 = self end
%function(self) self:hidden(1) vtd_group6 = self end
%function(self) self:hidden(1) vtd_group2 = self end
%function(self) self:hidden(1) vtd_group1 = self end
%function(self) self:hidden(1) vtd_group4 = self end
%function(self) self:hidden(1) vtd_group3 = self end
